name: Hijack Overdrive WIP
description:
Hijack Overdrive is an action packed Side-Scroller that combines 2D Platforming and Shootemup action, with GTA- and Tower Defense-like twitsts.

With an ever-changing fleet, made of vehicles you have to acquire yourself, you alone face off against an evil army of invading bad guys and monsters!


In this game you can hijack any and all enemy vehicles and use them against themselves.

You’re constantly on the move, stealing different vehicles, creating a small fleet on the fly, all while dodging enemy fire.

---------

It's still early in development,  but I would like to get as much feedback as possible. So feel free to test the game, and share your opinion on it with me here, or on twitter: @HijackOverdrive

Currently most of the game has placeholder graphics, so no feedback on that desired. Except for everything you see in the video above, while that is still not necessarily the final look, it is the style I'm going for.

The game also currently lacks proper explanations for everything in the game (I just placed some text in various places, explaining things, but that's ofcourse not how I intend it to be in the final version).
